name: DailySignal
text:
It is a discredit to modern Americans that we are now undoing the almost miraculous process of restoration achieved by men who had far more reason to hate.

This is what is lost in the blind efforts to remove statues and American history: https://t.co/tHGKE6Zb3h

name: DailySignal
text:
A YEAR ago @jarrettstepman wrote this piece about how left's mobs wouldn't stop with confederate statues—that George Washington was their next target.

Many laughed.

He was right: A statue of George Washington was torn down last night in Portland, Oregon. https://t.co/NLUstbLzSl https://t.co/emEn2NIQ7f

name: DailySignal
text:

text:

text:

name: DailySignal
text: Federal and state officials must rely on the best available scientific data—including updated clinical information on the course of #COVID19 and reliable epidemiological estimates. https://t.co/AdH6hXUaHo

name: DailySignal
text: California is a low-risk state for both COVID-19 deaths and total deaths. The 85% of Californians who are under 65 years of age are at very low risk for COVID-19—and those without underlying health conditions have essentially no risk. https://t.co/NxdeL7LEZa
